attributes.action: Cruelty to Animals Make all Fireworks Silent Fireworks
attributes.additional_details: Please be kind enough to sign this petition to get it up and Running as we need to get 10,000 signature for Parliament to look ate it so if you are a animal lover and want to make there lives better please take 2min to complete signature
attributes.background: This is a petition to Help the innocent Animals out there that are going through a Stressful time with these loud Banger Fireworks going off it is causing anxiety . and it is also not fair to elderly people out there that suffers with a bad heart . they do not just get let off on November the 5th
